scripts.fs-server2: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log DEBUG=noteApp:* PORT=3001 nodemon ./app.mjs
scripts.fs-server3: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log DEBUG=noteApp:* PORT=3002 nodemon ./app.mjs
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm run fs-server1' 'npm run fs-server2' 'fs-npm run server3'
